text: The minimum incidence of influenza - associated PICU admissions per 100 , 000 children < 17 years of age was calculated for each season based on the observed number of influenza PICU patients with a residential address in Bavaria . To correct for non - participating PICUs , the estimates of the total number of PICU influenza cases treated in all eligible PICUs in Bavaria per season were derived taking into account the annual percentage of participating PICUs . The annual study population was used as denominator .
